title: Enemy at the Gates
overview: In the winter of 1937, after the fall of Nanjing, five students from the Central Army Military Academy, headed by Zhou Zhen, retreated to Zijin Mountain. These five young people donâ€™t know where to go. At this critical moment, they met a dancer and a baby, the bounden duty of a soldier, so they decided to send their last hope to the Rabe safe zone without hesitation
